article.title: Eve_%28disambiguation%29
article.paragraph: wiktionaryEveeveEveis the first woman created by God according to the creation narrative of Abrahamic religions.

article.heading: Days
article.paragraph: The day before, or the evening before, a holiday, such as:

list.listitem: All Hallows Eve, another name for Halloween
Christmas Eve, the evening or entire day before Christmas Day, the widely celebrated annual holiday
St John's Eve, also called Midsummer's Eve or Bonfire Night
Avigilmay begin on the eve of a holy day or day of special significance
